title: Joyuu Meshi
alternative_title: 女優めし ; An Actress' Meal
status: 女優めし ; An Actress' Meal
description:
Description :
        Nadeshiko Izumi is a popular actress who is also known as "the last Yamato Nadeshiko." She is admired by everyone, but in fact, she loves "food" more than anyone else...! Japanese, Western, Chinese, spicy, sweet, and everything in between!
